question: In areas where a lot of earthquakes occur, architects are designing buildings with the ability to move with the land. How are the new building designs most likely to help people?
candidate_answers: (A) The new designs can help save lives. (B) The new designs are more attractive. (C) The new designs cost less to make. (D) The new designs are much taller.
answer: The new designs are much taller.
label: D
